short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily control web browsing within authenticated sites using centralized certificates managed in Redtrust.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a beta version for Redtrust authentication controller.

The extension is required in enterprise environments by the Redtrust agent to enable the use of digital certificates stored and managed in the Redtrust server. Our service provides the following benefits:

Maximum control and security when performing online transactions with digital certificates stored in the Redtrust server.*

Secure authentication of your employees when performing telematic procedures with the different agencies of the Public Administration.*

 Control for which specific procedures and for an electronic office – such as the Tax Agency – users can be authenticated with the digital certificate centralized in Redtrust.
